attributes.review:
Damon- Listen to us elena, this is toxic we are in a toxic relationship. I just killed your friend and you found someone else to blame.

Elena-  You want me to blame you?? Easy.  DONE. YOU screwed up Damon! AGAIN.

Damon- THANK YOU

Elena- You put me in a position where I had to defend you AGAIN. Where I had to bend my morals. AGAIN. BECAUSE I LOVE YOU. 

Damon- THEN STOP LOVING ME. 

Elena- I CAN’T
attributes.title: vampire diaries delena fighting scene
